phrases: Zankoku na tenshi no youni Like an angel without a sense of mercy...
Shonen yo shinwa ni nare...rise young boy to the heavens as a legend.
Aoi kaze ga i am about to Cold winds, as blue as the sea...
Tear open the door to your heart...
But unknowing you seem, just staring at me...
Sotto fureru mono Desperate for something to touch...
Motomeru koto ni muchu de A moment of kindness like that in a dream..
Your innocent eyes as yet have no idea...
Itaikena hitomi...of the path your destiny will follow.
But someday you will become aware of...
Sono senaka niwa...everything that you have got behind you.
Your wings are for seeking out...
Hanega arukoto...a new future that only you can search for.
Madobe kara yagate tobitatsu...through a portal like your pulsing blood.
Hotobashiru atsui pathos de If you should betray the chapel of your memories...
Omoide wo uragiru nara...the cruel angel will enter the window of your soul.
So boy, stand tall and embrace the fire of legend...
Embrace the universe like a blazing star!
I won a free ice cream bar!
Boy, the cost of doing laundry has been killing me lately.
I just wish I had the time to wash my clothes for myself.
You should appreciate the fact you can at least sleep at home.
Well, I have to go uptown as Ikari's representative.
Is not today the City Council's regular meeting?
He always forces the most tedious work on me.
Without the Magi's help, I could not do it.
Speaking of which, election day is coming up, is not it?
The City Council has no authority at all.
Actually, the Magi run everything now.
You mean the three super computers?
Government by majority decision of three different computers.
It is a sort of democratic system.
And the council just obeys their decisions?
It is a most effective form of government.
This truly is a City of Science.
We are fortunate to live in an era when Science reigns supreme.
Come to think of it, do not you have an experiment to run on Unit 00?
Yes, we are going to run the second prolonged activation test at 10:30.
This component is the problem again.
I think the problem is that the conversion efficiency
is 0.008 lower than our theoretical calculations.
It is within the tolerance though, barely.
What are we going to do?
Let us try it again using the same configuration,
but lower the reciprocal conversion rate by 0.01.
Now, let us recommence the reactivation experiment.
Now, let us recommence the reactivation experiment.
Man, I have never had to run this much!
So, what is with the black expression?
It is from seeing your loathsome face first thing in the morning.
Yes, hold just a moment please.
tell my parent that an interview
for Advanced Vocational Education is going to be held at school.
I have delegated things like that to Captain Katsuragi.
Do not bother me with such nonsense.
Do not forward any more of these calls to...
Perhaps Dr. Akagi made a mistake?
The main power supply has been interrupted.
It will switch to the backup power supply soon.
No, the backup circuits are not working.
Connect all remaining live circuits to the Magi and Central Dogma.
But that could interfere with life support systems.
Nozomu Takahashi, wants a happier government.
Boy, she is such a lazy slob.
Nozomu Takahashi, wants a happier government.
Boy, she is such a lazy slob.
We need your support for this honest candidate.
Cannot Katsuragi at least pick up her own laundry?
We need your support for this honest candidate.
Maybe Commander Ikari was just really busy?
It was not like he hung up.
It was more like a mechanical failure.
Hey, are you a man or what?
Stop letting every little incident bother you!
What do you think you are doing?
We would better head for the command station.
It is been seven minutes and the power has not been restored.
What is the backup power system here?
There are three circuits, main, sub and reserve.
It is virtually impossible for all of those to fail at once.
Someone must have blown them intentionally.
it would be disastrous if an Angel were to attack right now.
Radar has detected an unidentified object.
Projected landing point is in the former Atami region.
I agree, it must be an Angel.
What are we going to do?
This one's destination has to be Tokyo-3.
Well, this is no job for us.
What in the hell are those NERV guys doing?
I never thought I would actually have to use one of these trap exits.
I thought they were just holdovers kept for our peace of mind.
This one does not work either!
Could this mean that something is happened down in the Geo-Front?
It is natural to assume that.
In any case, let us try to make contact with NERV Headquarters.
No, the emergency phones are not getting through either.
No, there is no answer on Line 77.
So the main and emergency cables are both down.
I am looking for my emergency manual.
Anyway, let us go to NERV Headquarters.
Yeah, but first we will need to decide who will be group leader.
And naturally, I am the leader.
We can proceed through Route 07, right here.
But the doors do not work.
but you always defer to me at times like this.
They always defer to us at times like this.
They are getting ready to run.
In any case, we must contact NERV.
An unidentified object is moving toward this area.
All residents must evacuate to their designated shelters.
I have got to report this to Headquarters!
Remember Takahashi remains calm even in situations like this!
Yeah, the air conditioners are out.
Katsuragi, if you are so hot, why do not you take off your shirt?
There is no reason for shyness between you and me.
Do not even think about trying to take advantage of this situation.
Now, the air is getting stagnant.
Hard to believe this facility represents the most advanced technology on Earth.
But look at the Commander and Vice Commander.
Even in this much heat, they are cool and in command.
This Geo-Front was designed to be a self-sufficient colony,
even when isolated from the outside.
Theoretically, it is impossible for all of the power sources
to be shut down at once.
You mean that someone caused it to happen?
Their purpose would be to map this facility.
So they could determine HQ's structure through the restoration?
I will run a dummy program through the Magi.
That will make it harder for them to get a complete picture.
I will leave it to you.
I will leave it to you.
I cannot believe the first havoc wreaked upon our headquarters
was not caused by an Angel, but by another member of our species.
One of Mankind's greatest enemies is Man himself.
But it usually only takes two minutes.
Are you sure this is the right way?
If we can get past this point we will be there.
Have not I heard that four times already?
You always focus on the most insubstantial little tidbits.
We cannot waste any more time.
Let us take a short cut.
Do not take any initiatives without my permission!
Now then, where is this short cut?
This may be the quickest way, but we look really stupid.
Say, just what do you think the Angels are?
Why are you talking about that at a time like this?
Angels are messengers of God but our enemies are named after them.
So, why are we fighting them?
When someone is attacking you, you cannot just sit and do nothing.
I think the correct path is to the left.
I think the correct path is to the left.
Damn, I am the leader, so just shut up, and follow me!
I expected that this would be a little odd.
Look, this has got to be it this time!
Well, we have visually confirmed the Angel's presence.
Now, we know we have to hurry.
Immediate Eva dispatch will be necessary!
Fuyutsuki, take care of the rest of this.
I will help prepare for the launch in the cage.
We have a diesel generator for such emergencies.
I have heard that you are the Commander's favorite, are not you?
You are a favored smart ass who is treated differently than us.
This is not the time for that!
You have always got that smug look on your face.
Do you think you can act superior just because you are treated better?
And I am not treated better either.
Ejection of the termination plug is complete.
Good, prepare to insert the entry plug.
But the pilots are not here yet.
Do not worry, they will come.
There is no way I can open this with my hands.
We will have to break into a duct to get through.
This First Child is not someone to mess with.
She will do anything to accomplish her objectives.
She is a real self-righteous bitch.
The plug is fixed and ready.
Now, we just have to wait for the kids.
If you dare look forward, I will kill you!
I told you not to look!
I have to see to go forward!
It was all done by hand.
Commander Ikari believed in you three, and prepared everything.
All units activated using backup power supply.
Go ahead and remove the restraints.
The target has stopped right above us.
The emergency batteries have been installed!
We are approaching a vertical shaft.
It appears the target is going to invade HQ using liquid solvent.
We are going to beat it, of course.
We dropped our rifles, and the battery packs are running out.
They will not last more than another three minutes.
One of us will take the defensive position, and stay here.
Their job is to neutralize the Angel's AT Field,
and to protect the offensive player from that acid.
will go down, pick up the rifles, and hand them to the offense.
The offense will then fire a volley to destroy the target.
I see, I will take the defense.
Sorry, but it is not you.
I will feel bad if I do not repay you for the one I owe you from last time.
Asuka, get out of the way!
I have got to go to the bathroom!
Hey, I told you not to look up!
Without electricity and artificial light, the sky looks so beautiful.
But without the lights, it is as if there were no humans there.
I feel much more comfortable this way.
Man has always feared the Darkness, so he scrapes away at its edges with fire.
He creates life by diminishing the Darkness.
Is that what makes Mankind a special species?
Is that why the Angels keep attacking us?
Misato's career has been a crusade to exterminate the Angels.
Shinji finds a similar sentiment within himself.
The largest Angel yet comes flying through the stratosphere,
making many people abandon all hope.
Next time: The Value of a Miracle
